extensionDescription.message: Copies HTML links while transforming them into org mode format.

contextMenuItemLinkToOrg.message: Copy link to clipboard in org-mode format
contextMenuItemLinkToOrg.description: The item of the context menu for this addon.

linkToOrgFailed.message: Failed to copy link into the clipboard
linkToOrgFailed.description: Error to display when we couldn't write into the clipboard.
